content.en: For C-Insurance to successfully enter the Korean market, it must establish IT infrastructure that meets Korean financial regulations and IT compliance requirements. It is particularly important to meet requirements such as network separation, personal information protection, disaster recovery, and ISMS-P certification.
content.ko: C 보험사가 한국 시장에 성공적으로 진출하기 위해서는 한국의 금융 규제와 IT 컴플라이언스 요구사항을 충족하는 IT 인프라를 구축해야 합니다. 특히 망분리, 개인정보보호, 재해복구, ISMS-P 인증 등의 요구사항을 충족하는 것이 중요합니다.

recommendations.en: Phased Approach: It is advisable to take a phased approach to building IT infrastructure for entering the Korean market.
recommendations.ko: 단계적 접근: 한국 시장 진출을 위한 IT 인프라 구축은 단계적으로 접근하는 것이 바람직합니다.

recommendations.en: Hybrid Cloud Strategy: Consider a strategy of building critical systems on-premises while utilizing cloud for non-critical systems.
recommendations.ko: 하이브리드 클라우드 전략: 중요 시스템은 온프레미스로 구축하고, 비중요 시스템은 클라우드를 활용하는 전략을 고려해 볼 수 있습니다.

recommendations.en: Local Partnerships: Strengthen understanding and response capabilities regarding local regulatory environments through partnerships with Korean IT service providers or consulting firms.
recommendations.ko: 현지 파트너십: 한국의 IT 서비스 제공업체나 컨설팅 회사와의 파트너십을 통해 현지 규제 환경에 대한 이해와 대응 능력을 강화할 수 있습니다.

recommendations.en: Compliance First: It is important to design with compliance requirements as a priority when building IT infrastructure.
recommendations.ko: 컴플라이언스 우선: IT 인프라 구축 시 컴플라이언스 요구사항을 우선적으로 고려하여 설계하는 것이 중요합니다.

recommendations.en: Expert Consultation: Minimizing risk by seeking advice from experts on Korean financial IT regulations and compliance.
recommendations.ko: 전문가 자문: 한국의 금융 IT 규제 및 컴플라이언스에 대한 전문가의 자문을 받아 진행하는 것이 리스크를 최소화하는 방법입니다.

content.en: Information on IT-related regulations and laws applicable to Korea's financial and insurance industries.
content.ko: 한국의 금융 및 보험 산업에 적용되는 IT 관련 규제와 법규에 대한 정보를 제공합니다.

content.en: This report contains IT advisory content for C-Insurance's entry into the Korean market. To enter the Korean insurance market, it is necessary to meet domestic financial regulations and IT compliance requirements, and to build appropriate IT infrastructure accordingly.

description.en: A regulation for ensuring the safety of electronic financial transactions of financial companies and protecting users, providing detailed guidelines on IT security and internal controls.

items.en: Obligation to designate a CISO (Chief Information Security Officer)
Composition and operation of information protection organization
Implementation and management of security controls
Regular vulnerability diagnosis and penetration testing

description.en: Financial companies must operate with separated internal and external networks, which can be implemented in physical or logical ways.
description.ko: 금융회사는 내부망과 외부망을 분리하여 운영해야 하며, 이는 물리적 또는 논리적 방식으로 구현할 수 있습니다.

items.en: Physical network separation: Physical separation of work PCs and internet PCs
items.ko: 물리적 망분리: 업무용 PC와 인터넷용 PC를 물리적으로 분리

items.en: Logical network separation: Separation using virtualization technology
items.ko: 논리적 망분리: 가상화 기술을 활용한 분리

items.en: Application of security controls when transferring data between networks
items.ko: 망간 자료 전송 시 보안 통제 적용

description.en: A law on the collection, use, storage, and destruction of personal information, requiring financial companies to take strict measures to protect customer personal information.
description.ko: 개인정보의 수집, 이용, 저장, 파기 등에 관한 법률로, 금융회사는 고객 개인정보 보호를 위한 엄격한 조치를 취해야 합니다.

items.en: Obligation to subscribe to personal information damage liability guarantee system
Compliance with personal information security measures standards
Disclosure of personal information processing policy
Notification and reporting obligations in case of personal information leakage

description.en: A law to promote the use of information and communication networks and to protect the personal information of those who use information and communication services.

items.en: Information Security Management System (ISMS) certification obligation

description.en: An institution responsible for cyber security in the financial sector, providing security-related guidelines and supporting security incident response.
